content.rendered:
Directed by Madhu C. Narayanan

Written by Syam Pushkaran

Cast Shane Nigam (Bobby (as Shane Nigaam)). Soubin Shahir (Saji). Fahadh Faasil (Shammy). Sreenath Bhasi (Boney). Mathew Thomas (Franky). Ramesh Thilak (Murugan). Anna Ben (Babymol). Jasmine Metivier (Nylah). Grace Antony (Simi). Sheela Rajkumar (Sathy). Riah Sarah (Sumisha). Ambika Rao (Baby’s Mother) . Baiju Ezhupunna (Baby’s Uncle).Hossein Rahmani Manesh. Mirage (Tourist Home – Kallencherry Staff). Ajith Moorkoth (Psychologist). Lali P.M.(Mother). Ansal Palluruthy (Shyju). Deepu Palluruthy (Tourist Home – Kallencherry Staff). Meenaraj Palluruthy (Painting Asan). Vishala Palluruthy (Tourist Home – Kallencherry Staff). Sooraj Pops (Prasanth). Dileesh Pothan (Raju Unni). Priyanka (Tourist Home – Kallencherry Staff). Renjith Rajan (Factory Supervisor). Maraud Shaji (Police Officer). Sheena Jamie William (Tourist Home – Kallenchery Manager)

Languages Malayalam

Producers Nazriya Nazim. Dileesh Pothan. Syam Pushkaran. P.K. Sreekumar

Production Bhavana Studio. Fahadh Faasil and Friend. Working Class Her
